categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: The Tyrant was a pureblood Sith male Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War but was defeated and imprisoned on The Tomb on Belsavis; at the start of the Galactic War he was freed by the fighting and carved a path of destruction through the prison until a Republic individual defeated him.
